articles.description: THE MUTATED strain of coronavirus has been running rampant across the UK, responsible for a 94.8 percent rise in infections across the country. Now it has been discovered in another six countries outside the UK as scientists warn the new variant will likely b…

articles.title: The Times view on efforts to tackle coronavirus at Christmas: National Emergency - The Times
articles.description: There was some discussion over the weekend as to whether this is the worst moment of the pandemic so far. It will certainly feel like that to most people. It is not just the ruined Christmas plans and
